about_the_game:
Janosik 2: Prologue is an introduction to "Janosik 2", presenting a separate story that takes place right before the events of the main game.

Take on the role of Janka, Janosik's beloved, who is getting ready to meet up with her boyfriend. Little does she know that her plans are about to be disrupted by the evil Baron de Blonde, acting on behalf of the even more wicked Countess Bathory.

Use Janka's abilities to overcome various obstacles and enemies.

Metroidvania-style gameplay allows exploring previously visited locations to discover new secrets and bonuses through newly acquired skills.

Features:

  • Play as Janka: Step into the shoes of Janka, Janosik’s beloved, on an exciting adventure
  • Unlock New Abilities: Gain powerful abilities like double jump, freezing enemies, dashing through air, illuminating darkness, and wall climbing, with the help of Baba Yaga and her shop
  • 8 Challenging Levels: Explore 8 unique levels filled with challenging obstacles and deadly enemies
  • Metroidvania-style gameplay: Revisit previously explored areas and uncover hidden secrets and treasures with the help of newly unlocked abilities
detailed_description:
Wishlist Janosik 2


About the Game

Janosik 2: Prologue is an introduction to "Janosik 2", presenting a separate story that takes place right before the events of the main game.

Take on the role of Janka, Janosik's beloved, who is getting ready to meet up with her boyfriend. Little does she know that her plans are about to be disrupted by the evil Baron de Blonde, acting on behalf of the even more wicked Countess Bathory.

Use Janka's abilities to overcome various obstacles and enemies.

Metroidvania-style gameplay allows exploring previously visited locations to discover new secrets and bonuses through newly acquired skills.

Features:

  • Play as Janka: Step into the shoes of Janka, Janosik’s beloved, on an exciting adventure
  • Unlock New Abilities: Gain powerful abilities like double jump, freezing enemies, dashing through air, illuminating darkness, and wall climbing, with the help of Baba Yaga and her shop
  • 8 Challenging Levels: Explore 8 unique levels filled with challenging obstacles and deadly enemies
  • Metroidvania-style gameplay: Revisit previously explored areas and uncover hidden secrets and treasures with the help of newly unlocked abilities

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.10 & 20.04
  • Processor: 720p: Intel Pentium Dual Core G620 / 1080p: Intel Core i3-2120 or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 720p: Intel HD Graphics (Sandy Bridge) / 1080p: Intel HD Graphics 2000 (Sandy Bridge) or higher
  • Storage: 333 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated compatible soundcard

name: Janosik 2: Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 720p: Intel Pentium Dual Core G620 / 1080p: Intel Core i3-2120 or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 720p: Intel HD Graphics (Sandy Bridge) / 1080p: Intel HD Graphics 2000 (Sandy Bridge) or higher
  • Storage: 333 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Pick up the mantle of the plucky maiden getting ready for her date night that is unceremoniously interrupted by the dastardly duo of Countess Bathory and Baron de Blonde in this prologue to the colourful Janosik 2 retro action-platformer…
supported_languages: English, Polish, French, German, Russian, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Turkish, Ukrainian, Slovak
